text.section:
The applicable county planning board shall require a plat of any land reserved for public use under this subtitle that shows:
the survey location of the land;
the names and addresses of the landowners; and
any other information required for:
filing the plat among the land records of the county in which the land is located; and
the proper indexing of the plat.

The plat shall:
comply with all requirements for recording of plats among the land records; and
be recorded by the clerk of the court of the county in which the land is located.
